verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> which had <S%G4098>fallen<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G2807>key<s%> to the <S%G5421>pit<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G5421>pit<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2586>smoke<s%> went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> from a <S%G3173>burning<s%> <S%G2575>furnace.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%> were <S%G4654>darkened<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> from the <S%G5421>pit.<s%>

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> forth <S%G200>locusts<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4651>scorpions<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>They<s%> were <S%G4483>told<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G91>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> green <S%G5515>thing,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree,<s%> <S%G1487>but<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G3748>those<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> who <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4973>seal<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3361>foreheads.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>They<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G615>power<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G928>torment<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> for <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>Their<s%> <S%G929>torment<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G929>torment<s%> of a <S%G4651>scorpion,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> it <S%G3817>strikes<s%> a <S%G444>person.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G2212>will<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>will<s%> in <S%G3756>no<s%> way <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They will <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> will <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3667>shapes<s%> of the <S%G200>locusts<s%> were <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4171>war.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909>On<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G5613>were<s%> something <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5557>golden<s%> <S%G4735>crowns,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4383>faces<s%> were <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G444>people<s%>'s <S%G4383>faces.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%>'s <S%G2359>hair,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3599>teeth<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> those of <S%G3023>lions.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4603>iron.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G716>chariots,<s%> or of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G5143>rushing<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4171>war.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> those of <S%G4651>scorpions,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2759>stings.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> have <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G91>harm<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> for <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> as <S%G935>king<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss.<s%> His <S%G3686>name<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G3>is<s%> "Abaddon," <S%G2532>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1673>Greek,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G623>"Apollyon.<s%>"
The <S%G1520>first<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> is <S%G565>past.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> there are <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3759>woes<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> after <S%G5023>this.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3391>a<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5064>the<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> of the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> one <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%> <S%G3089>"Free<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G3089>freed<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> had been <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> that <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3376>month<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1763>year,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G615>kill<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G444>mankind.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G4753>armies<s%> of the <S%G2461>horsemen<s%> was <S%G1417>two<s%> hundred <S%G3461>million.<s%> <S%G3461><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>Thus<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3706>vision,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4447>fiery<s%> <S%G2532>red,<s%> <S%G5191>hyacinth<s%> <S%G2532>blue,<s%> and <S%G2306>sulfur<s%> <S%G2532>yellow;<s%> and <S%G2776>the<s%> <S%G2462><s%> <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> of <S%G3023>lions.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1537>Out<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2586>smoke,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2303>sulfur.<s%>

<S%G5259>By<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> plagues were one <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G444>mankind<s%> <S%G615>killed:<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G2586>smoke,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>the<s%> <S%G2303>sulfur,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the horses <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouths,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G3789>serpents,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2776>heads,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> they <S%G91>harm.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G444>mankind,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G615>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4352>they<s%> <S%G3361>wouldn't<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1140>demons,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1497>idols<s%> of <S%G5552>gold,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G693>silver,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5470>brass,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3035>stone,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3585>wood;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G991>see,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G4043>walk.<s%>

<S%G3340>They<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> repent <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2532>sorceries,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2809>thefts.<s%>
